name: Karlheinz Asylum
description:
A survival horror game inspired by the likes of Dino Crisis and Resident Evil.

Explore Karlheinz Asylum, a mental facility now operating illegally after being shut down decades ago.

Family can't get in touch with loved ones. Police officers haven't returned after visiting. Just what is going on at Karlheinz Asylum, and why?

Controls: PC or controller
